Objectifs du module: Nature of value creation networks and impacts of globalization ; Fundamental tradeoffs (capacity vs inventory vs delay vs value) and local/global optimization ; Supply Chain Management paradigms (total quality, leanness, quick response, customization, agility) ; Manufacturing and logistics strategy (order winners, decouping points, variety, postponement) ; Industry differences (process vs discrete products vs service) and reverse logistics. Cours dispensé : AFTRAL Paris 10ème et ENPC- Champs-sur-marne
